title: [Bug] Malzahar's Recall (Snow Day)
body: This doesn't change anything out of the gameplay for Malzahar, more of a visual bug in a recall animation. When recalling, the Voidling that he turns into a Poro-Voidling isn't showing up exactly as it should. It's a pure blue colour, instead of the purple that we see elsewhere. The Voidling pets that are spawned are the same however. Only the Voidling within Snow Day Malzahar's recall animation is a pure colour.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This little dude is missing his texture. We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
